issue.title: Trigger the creation of new images automatically

content.raw: In addition to the issue above, it looks like the build configuration settings may need to change. I don't think I have permission to access the build settings in the automated build Carlos created on the OSRF DockerHub page. Carlos, do you think you could grant me access?
content.html: In addition to the issue above, it looks like the build configuration settings may need to change. I don't think I have permission to access the build settings in the automated build Carlos created on the OSRF DockerHub page. Carlos, do you think you could grant me access?
